subject: PGA Championship
Golf
Players Championship (Golf)
lead_paragraph: In 26 events on the PGA Tour this season, there have been five aces, well off the pace from last year, when there were 30 in 44 tournaments.
snippet: In 26 events on the PGA Tour this season, there have been five aces, well off the pace from last year, when there were 30 in 44 tournaments.
